RainbruRPG::Trans::TransFile

RainbruRPG::Trans::TransFile Class Reference

#include <transfile.h>

Collaboration diagram for RainbruRPG::Trans::TransFile:

[legend]
List of all members.

Detailed Description

Get the transtate string of a file.

It handles the C and C++ style commentary and get the TR(...) strings. A string to translate can be in several lines : 

TR("First line"
    "secong line");

But nested commentary are forbidden in this case
